筋.definition: muscle; tendon; veins visible under the skin; sth resembling tendons or veins (e.g. fiber in a vegetable)

筋疲力盡.definition: body weary, strength exhausted (idiom); extremely tired; spent

筋節.definition: lit. muscles and joints; by ext. the relations between parts in a speech, composition etc

筋骨.definition: muscles and bones; physique; strength; courage
